Class Indexable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cloud9.collection.Indexable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aquaint2Document, ClueWarcRecord, IndexableAnchorText, MedlineCitation, TextDocument, WebDocument, WikipediaPage

    public abstract class Indexable
extends Object
implements Writable
    A document that can be indexed.

      Returns the type of the display content, per IANA MIME Media Type (e.g., "text/html").

      Returns the globally-unique String identifier of the document within the collection.
